channel.title: Website on Hugo ʕ•ᴥ•ʔ Bear Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Website on Hugo ʕ•ᴥ•ʔ Bear Blog

item.title: Making a Website II: The Wrath of World
item.description: Last time on, Making A Website… Action! Drama! SUSPENSE!!! No. Not really. Looking back now, my first pass at the website was okay. Here’s how it was. I’d foregone the templates and raised my sails and set out on the open seas of opportunity that only a blank folder can offer. I stripped out all the important bits from my original CV website and did my best to stitch it back together, basically rebuilding it but with better file structure.

item.title: Making a Website I: Hello World
item.description: I want a new website I’ve had a website once before, on Carrd. The whole thing was one page which gave the illusion of multiple pages by hiding content behind section break dividers. I didn’t know how to code anything when I made this, and it did the trick for having a handy place to show off my portfolio. But I’ve always wanted a proper website, one which hosts a blog and my comics in an interactive way.
